title: California National Historic Trail: Exhibits
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits               Exhibits        A wayside exhibit with a William Henry Jackson illustration tells the story of emigrants who came to this spring in the 1800s, located at Alcove Spring Park, Kansas. Waysides help bring historic trails sites to life. NPS   Â    California Exhibits: View wayside exhibits developed by National Trails Intermountain Region and a variety of partners on national historic trails in California. McCoy Park Minor Park New Santa Fe Cemetery
